answerText: "A Very Old Man With Enormous Wings" [10] "A Very Old Man With Enormous Wings" is one of several short stories by this author of the collection Leaf Storm and such novels as The Autumn of the Patriarch.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Harvard | 15 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this short story, Pelayo and Elisenda find the title character, and eventually Elisenda starts charging admission. For 10 points each:  [10] Identify this short story about the sudden appearance of an angel, who is eventually supplanted as the town freak by a woman transformed into a tarantula.
